name: ListApiKeys
description:
Retrieve all API keys for your Datadog account.

Use this tool to fetch a list of all API keys associated with your Datadog account. It is useful for managing or auditing your API key usage.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Specifies the number of API keys returned in a single page; maximum value is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: specific_page_number_to_return
parameters.description: The specific page number to return from the paginated list of API keys.

value_schema.description: Specific page number to return.

parameters.name: sort_by_attribute
parameters.description: Attribute to sort API keys by. Use a minus sign for descending order.

value_schema.description:
API key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

parameters.name: api_key_filter
parameters.description: String to filter API keys by specified criteria. Use it to narrow down the list based on specific string matches.

value_schema.description: Filter API keys by the specified string.

parameters.name: created_after_date_filter
parameters.description: Include API keys created on or after this date. Expected format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys created on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: filter_created_before_date
parameters.description: Include only API keys created on or before this date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys created on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: modified_after_date_filter
parameters.description: Specify a date to include API keys modified on or after this date. Use YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys modified on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: modified_before_date
parameters.description: Include API keys modified on or before this specified date. Format should be YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys modified on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: include_related_resources
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resource paths (`created_by`, `modified_by`) to include related data in the response.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of resource paths for related resources to include in the response. Supported resource paths are `created_by` and `modified_by`.

parameters.name: filter_api_keys_by_category
parameters.description: Filter API keys by the specified category.

value_schema.description: Filter API keys by category.

parameters.name: filter_by_remote_config_read_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true to filter API keys with remote config read enabled; false otherwise.

value_schema.description: Filter API keys by remote config read enabled status.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Specific page number to return.

value_schema.description: Specific page number to return.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
API key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

value_schema.description:
API key attribute used to sort results. Sort order is ascending
by default. In order to specify a descending sort, prefix the
attribute with a minus sign.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter API keys by the specified string.

value_schema.description: Filter API keys by the specified string.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][start]
parameters.description: Only include API keys created on or after the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys created on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: filter[created_at][end]
parameters.description: Only include API keys created on or before the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys created on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: filter[modified_at][start]
parameters.description: Only include API keys modified on or after the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys modified on or after the specified date.

parameters.name: filter[modified_at][end]
parameters.description: Only include API keys modified on or before the specified date.

value_schema.description: Only include API keys modified on or before the specified date.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma separated list of resource paths for related resources to include in the response. Supported resource paths are `created_by` and `modified_by`.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of resource paths for related resources to include in the response. Supported resource paths are `created_by` and `modified_by`.

parameters.name: filter[remote_config_read_enabled]
parameters.description: Filter API keys by remote config read enabled status.

value_schema.description: Filter API keys by remote config read enabled status.

parameters.name: filter[category]
parameters.description: Filter API keys by category.

value_schema.description: Filter API keys by category.
